title: "Apple's stock falls after WSJ report that Apple Watch sales will be halted"
date: after The Wall Street Journal reported the technology giant was set to halt Apple Watch sales in a preemptive move to comply with a U.S. import ban regarding use of blood-oxygen sensors. The ban
topics: which would include the Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2
sentiment: comes after the U.S. International Trade Commission found that Apple violated patents in most new models of its smartwatches since 2020

title: "Will Intel Stock Dominate the Artificial Intelligence (AI) PC Market?"
text: "Intel's new consumer CPUs are meant to bring AI technology to consumer products."

title: "Apple Halts Sale Of Watch Series 9 And Ultra 2 Over Patent Dispute"
text: "Apple will halt sales of its Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2 just days before Christmas due to a patent dispute with medical technology company Masimo over a blood oxygen monitor included in both models
